name: Go Kart Survival
description: Karting race game where player target is to survive with different tracks under limited time.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 8 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nividia 600 series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Direct x9
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 900 series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Direct x9
